N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 314.1 - Authority and purpose

State Regulations

The State Environmental Quality Review Act of 1975, as
amended, article 8 of the Environmental Conservation Law, provides that all
agencies of the State shall prepare, or cause to be prepared by contract or
otherwise, an environmental impact statement on any action they propose or
approve which may have a significant effect on the environment. The procedures
adopted in this Part shall be effective as of September 1, 1976 and shall
apply, in conjunction with regulations adopted by the State University

Construction Fund, as prescribed in article 8 of the Environmental Conservation

Law. Notes
